java/liquibase/change/DropPrimaryKeyChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropPrimaryKeyStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.HashSet;
00013 import java.util.Set;
00014 
00018 public class DropPrimaryKeyChange extends AbstractChange {
00019     private String schemaName;
00020     private String tableName;
00021     private String constraintName;
00022 
00023     public DropPrimaryKeyChange() {
00024         super("dropPrimaryKey", "Drop Primary Key");
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getSchemaName() {
00028         return schemaName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00032         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getTableName() {
00036         return tableName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00040         this.tableName = tableName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getConstraintName() {
00044         return constraintName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00048         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00052         return new SqlStatement[]{
00053                 new DropPrimaryKeyStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getConstraintName()),
00054         };
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00058         return "Primary key dropped from "+getTableName();
00059     }
00060 
00061     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00062         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00063         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00064             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00065         }
00066         
00067         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00068         if (getConstraintName() != null) {
00069             node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00070         }
00071         return node;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00075 
00076         Set<DatabaseObject> dbObjects = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00077 
00078         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00079         dbObjects.add(table);
00080 
00081         return dbObjects;
00082 
00083     }
00084 
00085 }
